comment: She can be a little unorganized at times but she is super caring and understanding of her students. If you email her, politely, and explain a situation she will work with you. I'm a C student and I got an A in her class. When we told her the 150 question test was too much, she curved it, and fixed her mistake for the next test. Just communicate.

Do not take her! She is unorganized and does absolutely nothing to help her students prepare for her 150 question exams PLUS a short essay. Her syllabus dates are off, she copied and pasted a different professors syllabus, so she barely know whats going on. No study guide is given for a 150 question tests!!
